item.title: Trump order leaves Afghans who were approved to resettle in the US in limbo

item.title: Once-in-a-lifetime snowstorm hits the South: See where the snow set records
item.description: The Gulf Coast is digging out from a once-in-a-lifetime snowstorm that struck from Texas to Florida, closing airports and crippling roadways.
